content.raw:
The naming of the surmark perception buoys appear to be inconsistent with the documentation. In the example test world the names of the surmark green and red buoys are : surmark\_950410 and surmark\_950400 with underscores. In the documentation of VRX2019\_Task\_Descriptions\_v1.4.pdf they are called; surmark950410 surmark950400;  without the underscores. 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/622440148-image.png)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/4279689887-image.png)
‌
content.html:
The naming of the surmark perception buoys appear to be inconsistent with the documentation. In the example test world the names of the surmark green and red buoys are : surmark_950410 and surmark_950400 with underscores. In the documentation of VRX2019_Task_Descriptions_v1.4.pdf they are called; surmark950410 surmark950400; without the underscores.
